onyomiExamples.meaning: being so broad-minded as to accept all sorts of things, both good and evil, being broad-minded enough to be tolerant of people of all shades

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to drink, to gulp, to swallow, to take (medicine), to smoke (tobacco), to engulf, to overwhelm, to keep down, to suppress, to accept (e.g. demand, condition), to make light of, to conceal
